title: Fake or Real T206 Ty Cobb front and backs on eBay
author: jamest206

posts.post_title: Fake or Real T206 Ty Cobb front and backs on eBay
posts.post_content: I just saw, and retracted bids on eBay with two Ty Cobb fronts and Ty Cobb backs on eBay.  Calling them 1923 Ty Cobb King of the Smoking World.  No way cards valued at six figures is being listed, ungraded.  I talked to the person and became very suspicious based on their answers.  Buyer beware or someone is hitting the lottery I suppose.
Fake all the way... just look at some of the other raw beauties he has
